mapper.insert: insert into comment(post_id, from_phone, content) values (#{post_id}, #{from_phone}, #{content})
mapper.select: select comment.id, comment.post_id, comment.from_phone, comment.content, comment.datetime, users.id user_id, users.role, users.username, users.gender, users.sign, users.avatar from comment inner join users on comment.post_id = #{id} and comment.status = 1 and users.phone = comment.from_phone
